name: Clicky X-Men
description: Try to click on all the images once and only once. Utilizes React JS

name: COVID-19 Tracker
description: Get data on COVID-19 for given state and nearby testing locations. Utilizes Web APIs, ChartJS, and Bulma CSS

name: Circle Restaurant Menu Mgmt
description: Web app designed for restaurant management. Write, save, view, and delete notes. Utilizes Javascript, NodeJS, ExpressJS, JSON, and Heroku

name: Read a Book
description: Heroku hosted book tracking app. Add books to an unread/read list and change status of book. Utilizes Javascript, NodeJS, Express Handlebars, MVC Framework, and Heroku

name: Duly Noted
description: Heroku hosted web note taking app. Write, save, view, and delete notes. Utilizes Javascript, NodeJS, ExpressJS, JSON, and Heroku

name: Employee Registry
description: An employee directory using React. Filter employess by search and also sort by name or date of birth.
